definition: to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: Scanning electron microscope image of the compound eye of a noctuid moth.
sentences.chinese: 扫描电子显微镜图像的复眼的夜蛾蛾。

sentences.english: The compound eyes looking up from their trodden-down souls at life's chains.
sentences.chinese: 像被踩入泥土的灵魂仰望生命的复眼。

sentences.english: The intensity could influence the ERG values of the compound eye of P. japonica.
sentences.chinese: 光强度对龟纹瓢虫成虫复眼ERG值有影响。

sentences.english: Each compound eye was composed of approximately 630 ommatidia.
sentences.chinese: 每个复眼约包括630个小眼。

sentences.english: These insects have a well-defined head with compound eyes and antennae.
sentences.chinese: 这些昆虫的头部，界限分明，长有复眼和触须。

sentences.english: It has a pair of compound eyes that composed of 28000 small eyes.
sentences.chinese: 它有由28000只小眼睛组成的一个对复眼。

sentences.english: It has two very big compound eyes and two shout feelers.
sentences.chinese: 它有两只非常大的复眼和两条短触角。

sentences.english: The compound eye of an insect like the housefly is effectively a bound of tapered fiber optical filaments.
sentences.chinese: 昆虫的复眼实际上是一束丝状的锥形光学纤维丝束。

sentences.english: Use a laser pen to irradiate one fly's compound eye.
sentences.chinese: 用激光笔照射一只苍蝇的复眼。

definition: ambulatory leg (of a crab, lobster, spider etc)
elytrum (hardened forewing of Coleoptera beetle, encasing the flight wing)
